summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Call Logs feature in Communication Center. All backend APIs (14/14 tests) passed. Frontend UI fully functional with call log list, filters, create dialog, edit dialog, and detail slide-over panel.
passed_tests: GET /api/call-outcomes returns valid outcome options (5 outcomes with labels)
GET /api/funds/{fund_id}/call-logs returns call logs for the fund
GET /api/funds/{fund_id}/call-logs with investor_id filter works
GET /api/funds/{fund_id}/call-logs with date range filters works
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/call-logs creates a call log without task
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/call-logs with create_task=true creates both call log and user task
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/call-logs validates outcome field
POST /api/funds/{fund_id}/call-logs validates investor exists
PUT /api/call-logs/{call_log_id} updates call log fields
PUT /api/call-logs/{call_log_id} returns 404 for non-existent log
DELETE /api/call-logs/{call_log_id} deletes call log
DELETE /api/call-logs/{call_log_id} returns 404 for non-existent log
GET /api/call-logs/{call_log_id} returns single call log
Create call logs with all 5 outcome types (no_answer, connected, interested, not_interested, follow_up_needed)
Call Logs sub-tab displays list of call logs with investor name, datetime, notes preview, and outcome badge
Call log with task shows 'Task created âœ“' badge
Filter by investor dropdown present and functional
Date range filters present
Log Call button opens create dialog with all required fields
Create Follow-up Task toggle expands task creation fields (title, priority, due date)
Clicking a call log opens slide-over detail panel
Detail panel shows all call log info including outcome badge, notes, next step
Edit button in detail panel opens edit dialog with pre-filled data
Delete button (trash icon) visible in detail panel
critical_code_review_comments: Backend CallLog model properly structured with all required fields
CALL_OUTCOMES constant provides consistent outcome options
Task creation from call log correctly links to investor's pipeline stage
Frontend CallLogsTab component well-organized with filters, list, and dialogs
OUTCOME_CONFIG provides consistent styling for outcome badges
CallLogDetailSheet slide-over panel shows comprehensive call log details
seed_data_creation: 2 call logs exist in database: John Smith (interested), Missing Ticket Corp (follow_up_needed with task created). Test data created during backend tests was cleaned up.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Call Logs feature fully functional. Current state: 2 call logs in database. All CRUD operations working. UI shows call log list with filters, create/edit dialogs, and detail slide-over panel. Task creation from call log creates user task linked to investor's pipeline stage. Fund ID: eea15889-0c70-4c6b-b02f-1b4d32596d27.
